name: Flage
description:
You failed your Pyromancer exam because you thought you needed to be a Pie Romancer. Your family has cast you out, and now it's time to redeem yourself!

How to Play:

WASD- Move

Left/Right Click- Cast assigned spell if you have enought Mana (Purple). Assign spell to button (when in the spell pick menu)

Special Moves- Holding Space, casting a spell, then releasing Space shoots 3 of the spell. Holding Shift, casting a spell, then releasing Shift shoots 8 of the spell. Special Moves cost Stamina (Green).

Level Up- Your XP (White/Cyan)  fills up by killing monsters. Once it reaches the top of the bar, you Level Up, increase your stats, and gain a Skill Point to spend on new spells.

Be Careful- Losing all your HP(Red) will cause you to lose all your current XP towards your next level (you wont lose Levels though).

Leaving- Leaving through the door on the bottom of the screen brings you to the level up menu. This only causes you to lose half your XP (White/Cyan) instead of all of it.

How to Win- Reaching a high enough level in an area will unlock the next area with harder monsters. Defeat all areas to gain recognition as an incredible Pyromancer!

---------

This game was made in 48 hours for a cutthroat game jam at WPI by Alexander 'Laugic' Hebert,  (code, art, concept), Sam Winter (design, concept, testing), and Aaron Graham (music).
